alerts.NOT_FOUND: The requested resource is not available
alerts.UNKNOWN_ERROR: There has been an error, try again later
alerts.DUPLICATE_USER: The phone number is already registered
alerts.FAILED_LOGIN: The phone number or password is incorrect
alerts.NOT_LOGGED_IN: You must be logged in to access this resource
alerts.INVALID_DATE: The selected date is not valid
alerts.INVALID_TIME: The selected time is not valid
alerts.RESERVATION_SAME_DAY: You can only make one reservation for the same day
alerts.RESERVATIONS_FULL: There are no more reservations available for the selected date and time
alerts.MAX_RESERVATIONS_EXCEEDED: You have reached the maximum number of reservations
alerts.MAX_CUSTOMERS_EXCEEDED: You have requested more seats than the available
alerts.SELECT_RESERVATION_TO_CANCEL: Select a reservation to be able to cancel it
alerts.CONFIRM_CANCEL_RESERVATION: Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation?
alerts.CONFIRM_DELETE_ACCOUNT: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Your reservations will be deleted
alerts.CONFIRM_DELETE_ACCOUNT2: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone
alerts.DUPLICATE_MENU_SECTION: A section with the same name already exists
alerts.CONFIRM_CANCEL_CHANGES: Are you sure you want to undo the changes?
alerts.CONFIRM_SAVE_CHANGES: Are you sure you want to save the changes?
alerts.CONFIRM_DELETE_MENU_SECTION: Are you sure you want to delete this section and all the products in it?
